data.name: 0000 (096.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think about this a lot, but no matter how you slice it, you're just way too tyrannical.

data.name: 0001 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Exactly what about me are you claiming is tyrannical?

data.name: 0002 (096.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Maybe the part where you glare at me for sharing that opinion, for example.

data.name: 0003 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well obviously. That's because you just said something very disagreeable, didn't you?

data.name: 0004 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Calling me "tyrannical" of all things is simply unthinkable.

data.name: 0005 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I give my absolute everything for the SOS Brigade and its members, after all.

data.name: 0006 (096.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What kind of bad joke is that? She can't possibly be serious, right?

data.name: 0007 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: After careful consideration, I concluded that my authority is in everyone's best interest.

data.name: 0008 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you have any complaints, then tell me something actually worth listening to.

data.name: 0009 (096.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm always trying to present constructive ideas, though.

data.name: 0010 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Eh, like what?

data.name: 0011 (096.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's end the summer camp immediately and go home.

data.name: 0012 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Rejected.

data.name: 0013 (096.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You never listen to what I have to say!

data.name: 0014 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Out of the question! What an unbecoming thing for a brigade member to say.

data.name: 0015 (096.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Damn it. Turns out I was right on the mark about her being tyrannical…

data.name: 0016 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Eh? Tyrannical? Me?

data.name: 0017 (096.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: No… Um…

data.name: 0018 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Only one person would dare say such a thing—Kyon!

data.name: 0019 (096.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eep…

data.name: 0020 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: He's always treating me like some kind of dictator!

data.name: 0021 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When dealing with the masses, you have to carefully decide when to use the carrot…

data.name: 0022 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …and when to use the stick. Just oppressing them simply won't do.

data.name: 0023 (096.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: C-could it be that you're interested in becoming a politician, Suzumiya…?

data.name: 0024 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Nah, not really.

data.name: 0025 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: All that talk about budgeting and policies—it doesn't sound fun at all, does it?

data.name: 0026 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Plus, if I were to disappear, then what would become of the SOS Brigade?

data.name: 0027 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We need to start seriously ramping up our reputation from here on out.

data.name: 0028 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We need to turn the tables so that the world's secrets start arriving at OUR doorstep.

data.name: 0029 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: To that end, we'd better get on with it and pin down the truth behind this case!

data.name: 0030 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Come on, Mikuru! Let me see some enthusiasm!

data.name: 0031 (096.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okay…

data.name: 0032 (096.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I have heard about your reputation for being a tyrant.

data.name: 0033 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm a tyrant?

data.name: 0034 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's rich coming from Kyon.

data.name: 0035 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: According to him, I just do whatever I please with everyone around me, right?

data.name: 0036 (096.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: That is how he recognizes it.

data.name: 0037 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Listen up, Yuki.

data.name: 0038 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's all because of my high-level leadership skills.

data.name: 0039 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you think about it, every great leader in history has been a little misunderstood.

data.name: 0040 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Their actions might seem self-righteous, but when you look at the bigger picture…

data.name: 0041 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …sometimes it's for the greater good.

data.name: 0042 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In a way, I make decisions based on their global impact.

data.name: 0044 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I knew he was clueless, but this is just pathetic.

data.name: 0045 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon is in dire need of some education, huh?

data.name: 0046 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And I'll make it as spartan as possible!

data.name: 0047 (096.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: He often expresses his discontent by referring to you as a tyrant, Miss Suzumiya.

data.name: 0048 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I know Kyon likes to complain like that, but don't misunderstand me here, Koizumi.

data.name: 0049 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I may appear strict with Kyon, but only because I'm trying to educate him.

data.name: 0050 (096.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Educate, you say…?

data.name: 0051 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: No matter what, he's always looking for shortcuts to every problem.

data.name: 0052 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: He never takes initiative, you know?

data.name: 0053 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: At this rate, he'll surely graduate without even realizing it…

data.name: 0054 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: He'll just continue drifting along through the system without a second thought.

data.name: 0055 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Just when he thinks he's found himself a nice job, he'll lose out to the harshness of society.

data.name: 0056 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's my duty to correct his course while I still can!

data.name: 0057 (096.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see, so that's all it was. What else should I have expected from Miss Suzumiya?

data.name: 0058 (096.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When you think about it, Kyon should be thanking me for my efforts!
